# Log N Log P from Stern+01 catalog, rebinned to avoid low number (<10) bins.
#
# There is no conversion from peak flux to peak count rate since data is from catalog.
# The last bin ends at 50.0, and there are 27 bins.
#
# Nb_GRBs/year/log10(pflx) is corrected for efficiency as described in Stern+01 (Fig.22).
# Total number of GRBs (after efficiency correction ) : 6938
#
# 1. Peak flux (left bin edge) [ph/cm2/s]  2. log10(Nb_GRBs/year/delta(log10(pflx)))  3. 1 sigma error in log10 scale
#
